all Радио TuneIn TuneIn Radio TuneIn Radio Радио TuneIn е безплатна услуга, която ви позволява да слушате всичко, независимо къде се намирате. Каквото желаете - музика, спорт или новини. Радио TuneIn предлага над 50 000 станции от които да избирате. Можете да намерите местните станции или да откриете нови станции от целия свят. Радио TuneIn ви отвежда точно където желаете да сте. TuneIn Radio is a free service that lets you listen to anything in the world from wherever you are. Whether you want to hear music, sports, news or current events. TuneIn Radio offers over 50,000 stations for you to choose from. From finding local stations to discovering new stations from around the world, TuneIn Radio brings you to where you want to be. TuneIn Radio es un servicio gratuito que te permite escuchar cualquier cosa del mundo desde donde te encuentres. Si deseas escuchar música, deportes, noticias o eventos actuales. TuneIn Radio ofrece más de 50,000 estaciones radiales para escoger, desde estaciones locales hasta descubrir nuevas estaciones alrededor del mundo, TuneIn Radio te lleva a donde tu quieras estar.
GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, 29 June 2007 http://forum.kodi.tv/showthread.php?tid=119315 http://brianhornsby.com/kodi_addons/tuneinradio https://github.com/brianhornsby/plugin.audio.tuneinradio

A GUI for Kodi Media Center This skin started as an unofficial Port of the Bello skin (by Nessus) for the Kodi 15.x Nightlies and ended up in an independent skin with a lot of modifications, such as 100% customizable widgets, new themes, modded elements, hundreds of improvements, and much more... all Skin based on the Fire TV UI Does not support:[CR]Mouse[CR]Touch[CR]Live TV Basic fTV skin (by Hitcher) with nearly full PVR functionality, plus changed a lot of behaviours and added dozens of other features[CR]Skin description: Provides the look and feel of the Fire TV user interface.[CR]For the complete experience enable 'TV Show wide icons' and either use Artwork Downloader to grab logos or create your own artwork and add it to the database (see forum for more details).
all Skin based on the Fire TV UI No mouse or touch support Fork of Hitcher's fTV skin with nearly full PVR functionality, plus changed a lot of behaviours and added dozens of other features[CR][CR]Skin description: Provides the look and feel of the Fire TV user interface.[CR]For the complete experience enable 'TV Show wide icons' and either use Artwork Downloader to grab logos or create your own artwork and add it to the database (see forum for more details).
